data.message: i dont like the new layout -_- please change this . the older one was better :))

replies.message: Hi Lance. Updates are necessary to keep up with ever-changing technology. Is there something that we could include to improve your Facebook experience? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1m0aHiu - Kristen
hi
lol
facebook plz if you change somthing let us know. and were is your Contact mail ? very strange you don't have one. FB you sucks. you always did anyway
Old Style was the Best. Amateurs. yea USA what you want.
i'm not the owner of Facebook . why are you suggesting  some things in my comment ?
Because they are stupid, that's why. ;)

How do the technology forces you to change the layout of the page?

Would this, the real part which matter, be any wider at higher resolution? Or would the empty spaces just be even larger?

Is it designed to have a decent text width?

Looks ugly. I don't care all that much for the stuff to the left, I don't care about the timelinethingy to the right. I don't care much for the chat (you can hide it but it doesn't really change the layout.)
Facebook If my facebook ID haven't changed to new facebook layout,then how can i change it to new layout. Thanks.
Because your comment is on top, they can at least see something here among other thousands of comments. I'm very sorry if that annoyed you, deleted my post.
That new layout is awfull...
I can't work with this new layout. I think it's time to quit with facebook!
Wow we seem so ungrateful for this free service they provide.
Next time , the advertisings are going to be in the middle ??
Hi Verona. Sorry to hear you don't like the new design. What about it would you like to see changed? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1m0ZXAt -Leigh
We're sorry to hear that, Adam, but we appreciate the feedback. Please let us know what you would like to see changed at: http://on.fb.me/NaVFHF -Leigh
i have no new news in my news feed what ever i do it is just the same punch of news always appear , what am i supposed to do ?
I hate the new version! Just a small strip and the rest of the page is wasted. My photo's are smaller, not larger as promised in the promo. This sucks!

hi Facebook, will you still include the Merge duplicate page button? I remember the last time I tried to merge my pages. It says an unknown error' occurred and when I click the 'help link' it says: "The link you've clicked can't be found'. Thanks for answering.

Facebook If you're going to change the layout without warning, perhaps you can provide an option for users to switch to the old layout, until they get used to the new one? This change is pretty drastic.
#makarov, dude it's ok hahaha
hey Facebook . i want to enable my followers but i don't have that in my settings -_- please enable it for me Ms. Kristen :))

There are some wonderful stuff in the new design, as well as there are bad things, and I hope will do the change. As the tradition of Google + or Twitter is not a shame, how beautiful it is to imitate others, but our own that make us differ from them a little bit
how can i update my facebook design? it's still the old one..
Facebook I Like The New Style Of Facebook!! Keep Up The Good Work ;)
